channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Attorneys are suing to keep 10 migrants out of Guantanamo Bay as others say they were abused there
item.description: Civil rights attorneys are suing the Trump administration to prevent it from transferring 10 migrants detained in the U.S. to Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

item.title: They weren’t considered fully human when they died. Now they’re being reburied with equal rights
Grammy-nominated R&B singer Angie Stone dies in car crash
